title: Andrea "The Beginning"
description: The Holy Trinity.That is what they call themselves.For years, the three most notorious crime families of Detroit have ruled together in peace, until now. Now the new generation rises and so does greed. Lust for power will turn brother against brother.Sister against sister.Man or woman, it matters not.For one to rule the other must fall.Glory be to the Father, Who by His almighty power and love created me, making me in the image and likeness of God.Glory be to the Three Adorable Persons of the Holy Trinity, now and forever. Amen.I am Andrea Valentina Nicolasi â€“ Turner and this is the beginning of the end.
author: Adriana Brinne
